title.rendered: Day 4. Cirone Swimlingerie. Miami Swim Week

content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 4. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive: 

Cirone Swimlingerie

Next, Cirone Swimlingerie took swimwear to a new level with a line of sophisticated pieces overflowing with glamour. The Piece De Resistance Collection 20/21 featured Swarovski crystal embellishments intricately placed by hand.

Fashion model Caroline Derpienski walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Caroline Derpienski walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Hailey Thompsonn walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Christina Peng walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Model Anna Noel walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Valerie Ehimhen walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Valerie Ehimhen walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Karina Ramos walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Christina Galioto walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Alejandra walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Genevieve Madison walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Monique Victoria walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Monique Victoria walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Olia walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Olia walks for Cirone Swimlingerie

Fashion model Olia walks for Cirone Swimlingerie


Cirone Swimlingerie By Solveig Cirone

Piece De Resistance Collection 20/21 brings to the front stage pin-stripes, torch light, and a sempiternal spring lavender to embrace an ethereal look. The collection features Lycra designs in black, silver, bronze, gold, and lavender with Swarovski crystal embellishments intricately placed by hand. 2020-21 signifies Solveig Cirones fifth year as the Norweigan-Italian creative director and president of Cirone Swimlingerie. Piece de resistance is an artists greatest work. During the Covid Pandemic, Solveig recognized these times as a rebirth and resurgence of the Resilient Jazz Age.

Designer: Solveig Cirone @solveigcirone_ www.cironeswim.com


Photo by Natalie Svors. Exclusively for 24Fashion TV.
